SA10n1052:6: syureva, yadi skandhāḥ syuḥ tatra rūpaskandhamadhikṛtyāha -
SA10n1052:11: tadvayatiriktaṃ pṛthagbhūtaṃ rūpaṃ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyākhyaṃ nopalabhyate ghaṭādiva paṭaḥ |
SA10n1052:17: evaṃ rūpakāraṇacaturmahābhūtavyatirikta bhautikaṃ rūpamiṣyamāṇaṃ na bhūtahetukaṃ syāt |
SA10n1052:20: idānīṃ rūpeṇāpi vinirmuktaṃ yathā rūpakāraṇaṃ nāsti,
SA10n1052:25: yathā ghaṭātkuṇḍaṃ pṛthaksiddhaṃ ghaṭahetukaṃ na bhavati,
SA10n1052:34: atha cedaṃ rūpasya kāraṇamiṣyamāṇaṃ sati vā rūpe kāraṇatveneṣyate'sati vā?
SA10n1052:38: sati vā saṃvidyamāne rūpe kiṃ rūpakāraṇena prayojanam?
SA10n1052:39: asati asaṃvidyamāne rūpe kiṃ kiṃ rūpakāraṇena prayojanam,
SA10n1052:42: atha syāt - yadyapi evaṃ rūpakāraṇaṃ na saṃbhavati,
SA10n1052:49: asati kāraṇe kuto nirhetukaṃ kāryaṃ rūpaṃ bhavet?
SA10n1052:50: naiva naivetyanena sāvadhāraṇena pratiṣedhadvayena ahetukatvādasyātyaniṣṭatāṃ darśayati |
SA10n1052:51: yataścaivaṃ rūpaṃ sarvathā vicāryamāṇaṃ na saṃbhavati,
SA10n1052:56: api ca | idaṃ rūpakāraṇamiṣyamāṇaṃ sadṛśaṃ kāryaṃ niṣpādayedasadṛśaṃ vā?
SA10n1052:62: bāhyaṃ tu rūpādyāyatanādikaṃ cakṣurvijñānādigrāhyalakṣaṇaṃ na mahābhūtasvabhāvamiti |
SA10n1052:65: na cāpi sadṛśānāṃ śālibījādīnāṃ parasparakāryakāraṇabhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ, ityataḥ
SA10n1052:70: yathā cedaṃ rūpaṃ vicāryamāṇaṃ sarvathā nopapadyate,
SA10n1052:76: yathaiva hyekasya dharmasya śūnyatā pratipādayitumiṣṭā mādhyamikena,
SA10n1052:79: vigrahe yaḥ parīhāraṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet |
SA10n1052:82: śūnyatayā kāraṇabhūtayā rūpaṃ niḥsvabhāvamityevaṃ sasvabhāvavāde pratiṣiddhe,
SA10n1052:86: yasmādvedanādīnāmapi sadbhāvaḥ sādhyena rūpasadbhāvena samo veditavyaḥ |
SA10n1052:91: saṃskārapratyayaṃ ca vijñānaṃ svakāraṇātsparśādeḥ tattvānyatvādinā vicāryamāṇaṃ nāstīti sarvametatsādhyasamaṃ bhavati |
SA10n1052:93: evaṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇa kāryakāraṇāvayavyavayavādayo'pi sarva eva padārthāḥ rūpeṇa sādhyena samā iti kutaḥ parasya parīhāra saṃbhavet?
SA10n1052:94: sarvaṃ vacanamasya sādhyasamaṃ bhavatīti sarvatra śāstre parīhāreṇa sādhyasamatvaṃ mādhyamikenā grāhaṇīyamityācāryaḥ śikṣayati ||8 ||
SA10n1052:97: vyākhyāne ya upālambhaṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet |
SA10n1052:101: bhāvasyaikasya yo draṣṭā draṣṭā sarvasya sa smṛtaḥ |
SA10n1052:102: ekasya śūnyatā yaiva saiva sarvasya śūnyatā || iti |
SA10n1052:109: yatha ñāta tayātmasaṃjña tathaiva sarvatra peṣitā buddhiḥ |
SA10n1052:110: sarve ca tatsvabhāvā dharma viśuddhā gaganakalpāḥ ||
SA10n1052:112: kiyadbahu pi bhāvetvā na tasyotpadyate madaḥ ||iti |
SA10n1052:113: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacittāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau skandhaparīkṣā nāma caturtha prakaraṇam ||
